import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import InputText from '../../components/inputText' import api from '../../util/api' export default function EditCategoryModal({ item, open, setOpen }) { const [title, setTitle] = useState(item.title) const [error, setError] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { api.getCategory(item.id) .then(response => { setTitle(response.data.name) }) }, [item]) const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault() if (title !== '') { editCategory() setOpen(false) alert("Successfully edited category.") } } function editCategory() { item.name = title api.editCategory(item.id, item) } return (
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} {/* ​ */}
Edit category
setTitle(e.target.value)} />
) }
